Articles.Content: Any mods out there for 0.22 that allow for motorized hinges and joints, like the old Damned Robotics mod? I'm playing a mostly vanilla career mode game. I have some utility mods like Kerbal Alarm Clock, Maneuver Mode Improvement, etc installed. But the only parts mod I have is Procedural Fairings. I would like the ability to "fold up" some of my designs to fit within fairings better, then use servos to unfold them in orbit - that's where the robotics-esque mod comes in. So, any thoughts?

Damned Robotics was transformed into Infernal Robotics (link).

It works in .22 Sandbox, but isn't set up for the Career tech tree yet. Lots of parts to fix, so I'm sure there's an update coming but don't know when.
